Title: Trigonometry
Director: S.M. Rana, Motin Shagor, Mahmudul Hoque Noble
Actors: S.M. Shawkat Ali, Moutushi Biswas, Sharmin Akter Jui
Plot: A teenage boy Shakil falls in love with an older girl Atoshi, but the girl just cannot bond with him. Sabuz goes and sends her gifts so that they get closer and sends her a proposal which she accepts.
